text:
Don't write with ChatGPT.

Make it judge your writing instead:

1. ChatGPT is better at judging, bad at executing.
2. Take advantage of it and critique your writing.
3. Use this prompt guide: https://lnkd.in/gn48XKM8.

Here's the prompt: 

"Act like a senior conversion copywriter and editor.

Your job is NOT to rewrite. Your job is to CRITIQUE.

Task: Read my [sales page / email / landing page] and identify:
1) The 3 weakest lines (and why they’re weak)
2) Where the reader might lose interest
3) What’s missing that would make this more persuasive

Be brutally honest. No fluff. Grade each section A/B/C/D/F.

Here’s my copy:
///
[paste your copy here]
///"
